Generation VIII.Sword: Trainers Polteageist trusts will be allowed to experience its distinctive flavor and aroma firsthand by sampling just a tiny bit of its tea.
Generation VIII.Shield: When angered, it launches tea from its body at the offender's mouth. The tea causes strong chills if swallowed.

Generation IX.Scarlet: Apparently a Polteageist’s disposition is affected by the type of tea the Pokémon came from. What teapot it inhabits makes no difference.
Generation IX.Violet: Though risky to drink, this Pokémon's tea tastes delicious. Gourmets who have no fear of danger drink Polteageist tea day after day.
